name: Project Configuration Changes
description: Module that displays the configuration changes in a project

authors.name: Mintoo Xavier
authors.institution: Cambridge University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust

project-settings.name: Provide the email address from which notifications are send
Provide the email address to receive notifications of configuration changes
Provide the maximum number of days to look back for displaying configuration changes . Default is 7 days
Provide the maximum time interval in hours to send email notifications. Default is 3 hours

crons.cron_description: project_config_cron: Checks for any configuration changes in all projects and sends email notifications if any changes are detected.
